ygData.subject: Re: re:
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Perhaps though, the casting time is ignored for the proc, just like the fact that it is a 49th SK spell is ignored (remember, anyone can right click a
ygData.messageBody:
Grant Vanderhule wrote:
>
> From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>
>
> thanks again xillith. i still dont think these are weapon procs tho.. while
> VE can be interrupted, and even the DR on rare occasions, a spell with as
> long a casting time as life leech would be almost impossible to get off in
> battle. however.. come to think i DO remember paragon on eqss saying that
> after a patch his pestilence scythe had 1 charge of this..
>

Perhaps though, the casting time is ignored for the proc, just like
the fact that it is a 49th SK spell is ignored (remember, anyone
can right click a charged item)

Just my hunch, if it is in the game, _wow_! *wonders how many
times he could cast a 315 mana spell* Also, if you look at the other
spells listed, numerous spells (vamp embrace and lifetap, vamp curse)
have the spell effect listed as "life leech".

Xilith
